#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=BUNCHES OF KNUCKLES
#Text=ARRANGEMENTS quite extensive had been made for the celebration of Christmas on the yacht Samoset .
#Text=Not having been in any civilized port for months , the stock of provisions boasted few delicacies ; yet Minnie Duncan had managed to devise real feasts for cabin and forecastle .
#Text=“ Listen , Boyd , ” she told her husband .
#Text=“ Here are the menus .
#Text=For the cabin , raw bonita native style , turtle soup , omelette a la Samoset -- ”
#Text=“ What the dickens ? ” Boyd Duncan interrupted .
#Text=“ Well , if you must know , I found a tin of mushrooms and a package of egg-powder which had fallen down behind the locker , and there are other things as well that will go into it .
#Text=But do n't interrupt .
#Text=Boiled yam , fried taro , alligator pear salad --
#Text=there , you 've got me all mixed , Then I found a last delectable half-pound of dried squid .

#Text=There will be baked beans Mexican , if I can hammer it into Toyama 's head ; also , baked papaia with Marquesan honey , and , lastly , a wonderful pie the secret of which Toyama refuses to divulge . ”
#Text=“ I wonder if it is possible to concoct a punch or a cocktail out of trade rum ? ” Duncan muttered gloomily .
#Text=“ Oh ! I forgot !
#Text=Come with me . ”
#Text=His wife caught his hand and led him through the small connecting door to her tiny stateroom .
#Text=Still holding his hand , she fished in the depths of a hat-locker and brought forth a pint bottle of champagne .
#Text=“ The dinner is complete ! ” he cried .
#Text=“ Wait . ”
#Text=She fished again , and was rewarded with a silver-mounted whisky flask .
#Text=She held it to the light of a port-hole , and the liquor showed a quarter of the distance from the bottom .
#Text=“ I 've been saving it for weeks , ” she explained .
#Text=“ And there 's enough for you and Captain Dettmar . ”
#Text=“ Two mighty small drinks , ” Duncan complained .
#Text=“ There would have been more , but I gave a drink to Lorenzo when he was sick . ”
#Text=Duncan growled , “ Might have given him rum , ” facetiously .
#Text=“ The nasty stuff !
#Text=For a sick man ?
#Text=Do n't be greedy , Boyd .
#Text=And I 'm glad there is n't any more , for Captain Dettmar 's sake .
#Text=Drinking always makes him irritable .
#Text=And now for the men 's dinner .
#Text=Soda crackers , sweet cakes , candy -- ”
#Text=“ Substantial , I must say . ”
#Text=“ Do hush .
#Text=Rice , and curry , yam , taro , bonita , of course , a big cake Toyama is making , young pig -- ”
#Text=“ Oh , I say , ” he protested .
#Text=“ It is all right , Boyd .
#Text=We 'll be in Attu-Attu in three days .
#Text=Besides , it 's my pig .
#Text=That old chief what-ever-his-name distinctly presented it to me .
#Text=You saw him yourself .
#Text=And then two tins of bullamacow .
#Text=That 's their dinner .
#Text=And now about the presents .
#Text=Shall we wait until tomorrow , or give them this evening ? ”
#Text=“ Christmas Eve , by all means , ” was the man 's judgment .
#Text=“ We 'll call all hands at eight bells ; I 'll give them a tot of rum all around , and then you give the presents .
#Text=Come on up on deck .
#Text=It 's stifling down here .
#Text=I hope Lorenzo has better luck with the dynamo ; without the fans there wo n't be much sleeping to-night if we 're driven below . ”
#Text=They passed through the small main-cabin , climbed a steep companion ladder , and emerged on deck .
#Text=The sun was setting , and the promise was for a clear tropic night .
#Text=The Samoset , with fore- and main-sail winged out on either side , was slipping a lazy four-knots through the smooth sea .
#Text=Through the engine-room skylight came a sound of hammering .
#Text=They strolled aft to where Captain Dettmar , one foot on the rail , was oiling the gear of the patent log .
#Text=At the wheel stood a tall South Sea Islander , clad in white undershirt and scarlet hip-cloth .
#Text=Boyd Duncan was an original .
#Text=At least that was the belief of his friends .
#Text=Of comfortable fortune , with no need to do anything but take his comfort , he elected to travel about the world in outlandish and most uncomfortable ways .

#Text=Incidentally , he had ideas about coral-reefs , disagreed profoundly with Darwin on that subject , had voiced his opinion in several monographs and one book , and was now back at his hobby , cruising the South Seas in a tiny , thirty-ton yacht and studying reef-formations .
#Text=His wife , Minnie Duncan , was also declared an original , inasmuch as she joyfully shared his vagabond wanderings .

#Text=Among other things , in the six exciting years of their marriage she had climbed Chimborazo with him , made a three-thousand-mile winter journey with dogs and sleds in Alaska , ridden a horse from Canada to Mexico , cruised the Mediterranean in a ten-ton yawl , and canoed from Germany to the Black Sea across the heart of Europe .

#Text=They were a royal pair of wanderlusters , he , big and broad-shouldered , she a small , brunette , and happy woman , whose one hundred and fifteen pounds were all grit and endurance , and withal , pleasing to look upon .
#Text=The Samoset had been a trading schooner , when Duncan bought her in San Francisco and made alterations .

#Text=Her interior was wholly rebuilt , so that the hold became main-cabin and staterooms , while abaft amidships were installed engines , a dynamo , an ice machine , storage batteries , and , far in the stern , gasoline tanks .
#Text=Necessarily , she carried a small crew .
#Text=Boyd , Minnie , and Captain Dettmar were the only whites on board , though Lorenzo , the small and greasy engineer , laid a part claim to white , being a Portuguese half-caste .
#Text=A Japanese served as cook , and a Chinese as cabin boy .
#Text=Four white sailors had constituted the original crew for'ard , but one by one they had yielded to the charms of palm-waving South Sea isles and been replaced by islanders .
#Text=Thus , one of the dusky sailors hailed from Easter Island , a second from the Carolines , a third from the Paumotus , while the fourth was a gigantic Samoan .
#Text=At sea , Boyd Duncan , himself a navigator , stood a mate 's watch with Captain Dettmar , and both of them took a wheel or lookout occasionally .
#Text=On a pinch , Minnie herself could take a wheel , and it was on pinches that she proved herself more dependable at steering than did the native sailors .
